reviewText: Lifetime is the best!!!

This movie is good, could of had better cast but the story is good.you will enjoy it if you buy it.

Love always seems to escape Donna's grasp. Tormented by a past laced with adultery, betrayal and murder, Donna desperately tries to create a fresh life in a new town where she meets the perfect man, her new neighbor, William. The only obstacle in her way is his wife. As Donna's obsession with William grows, old fatal tendencies emerge. Will history repeat itself when Donnas need for love becomes deadly
Barbara Niven is perfect for this role as the crazy, obsessed neighbor.  This is another one of my favorite Lifetime movies, so I added it to my collection.
If you are a suspense person, you may find this movie to be entertaining.  It has it's moments and worth purchasing.  I would recommend it.

This was a well played movie and has a great cast including Perry King and Susan Blakeley. Just look out for some whako neighbor to come and ruin your perfectly seeming lives, played well by Barbara Niven.

THIS WAS A VERY GOOD LIFETIME ORIGINAL MOVIE! TRUE, THE CAST WAS over 20, BUT THAT IS TO BE EXPECTED. THIS WAS AN ADULT TYPE FILM-NOT MEANING SEXUAL-JUST MATURE! IF U DON'T LIKE MOVIES LIKE THIS, THEN I'M SURE NICK AT NIGHT IS IN YOUR AREA....

There is nothing sexy about this film at all ! Most straight to video releases a have a brick house babe ! Or lots of sex or nudity this is a waste of time. At least if the quality of the movies are going to be B it could offer something ! The people in this movie are all 50 years old ! I don't know what the director was thinking ! At least if you can't come up with a original idea you could bring some appeal to it ! Horrible movie a complete waste of time! I wanted all my time spent refunded !
